stance_1: Chicken and pork are less expensive than beef
stance_2: I choose meats that are on sale

justification: The lower cost of chicken and pork implicitly supports eating mostly chicken.

stance_1: I choose meats that are on sale
justification: Preferring chicken and fish may be supported by choosing meats that are on sale if those are the ones more frequently discounted.
